Text: FW People in need Original Message From David Granit Sent Monday February AM To Natalie Bondareva Bianca Ornelas Felipe Ospina Kevin Butler Chris Chang Cc Subject People in need Open up your heart Now that the holiday season has passed please look into your heart to help those in need Enron executives in our very own country are living at or just below the sevenfigure salary levelright here in the land of plenty And as if that werent bad enough they will be deprived of it as a result of the bankruptcy and current SEC investigation But now you can help For only a month about a day thats less than the cost of a large screen projection TV you can help an Enron executive remain economically viable during his time of need This contribution by no means solves the problem as it barely covers the per diem but its a start Now may not seem like a lot of money to you but to an Enron exec it could mean the difference between a vacation spent sucking ass in DC golfing in Florida or on a Mediterranean cruise For you seven hundred dollars is nothing more than rent a car note or mortgage payments But to an Enron exec will almost replace his or her per diem Your commitment of less than a day will enable an Enron exec to buy that home entertainment center trade in the yearold Lexus for a new Ferrari or enjoy a weekend in Rio HOW WILL I KNOW IM HELPING Each month you will receive a complete financial report on the exec you sponsor Detailed information about his or her stocks bonds k real estate and other investment holdings will be mailed to your home Youll also get information on how he plans to invest his golden parachute Imagine the joy as you watch your executives portfolio double or triple Plus upon signing up for this program you will receive a photo unsigned for a signed photo please include an additional Put the photo on your refrigerator to remind you of other peoples suffering HOW WILL HE KNOW IM HELPING Your Enron exec will be told that he has a SPECIAL FRIEND who just wants to help in a time of need Although the exec wont know your name he will be able to make collect calls to your home via a special operator just in case additional funds are needed for unexpected expenses YES I WANT TO HELP I would like to sponsor an Enron executive My preference is checked below Midlevel Manager Director Vice President Higher cost please specify which department President Even higher cost please specify which department CEO Contribution Average Enron janitor monthly salary x Entire Company Ill sponsor an Exec most in need Please select one for me David Granit Implementation Consultant AllegroDevelopment Software for the Energy Industry wwwallegrodevelopmentcom The information contained in this email message is intended only for the personal and confidential use of the recipients named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or an agent responsible for delivering it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that you have received this document in error and that any review dissemination distribution or copying of this message is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please notify us immediately by email and delete the original message

justleft one key hire off the list Aftab Saleem Project Director BS Electrical Engineering UT MBA IS UT Relevant experience Enron months Petrocosm yr Deloitte Consulting years left as Senior Manager Original Message From Cyndi Henderson Sent Monday February PM To Allegro Group Subject New Hires Feb Allegro Hits With the addition of the new hire class today Allegro is officially at employees This is the first time in our history to crack the employee mark and cause for celebration for our companys success New hire meet greet happy hour at Avanti on Thursday after work all are welcome Joining us today Cory Willis Implementation Consultant BA Texas AM Relevant industry experience Enron months Enform Technology yrs Koch Intern Brad Carey Implementation Consultant BA Economics Southwestern MBA Finance Texas AM Relevant industry experience Enron yrs Exxon yrs Chris Chang Implementation Consultant BBA Accounting UT Relevant industry experience Enron months Exxon yrs Jesus Guerra Implementation Consultant BBA Accounting Sam Houston State MBA Finance University of St Thomas Houston Relevant industry experience Enron yrs Penzoil yrs Dow Chemical Company intern Lisa Rogers Technical Consultant BA Psychology Texas Tech Relevant technical experience Red Maple Technologies yr Mission Trade yrs John Collins Automated Tester BS Comp Sci UNT Relevant experience years Systems AnalystMercury Suite exp in telecom industry Dag Joraholmen Sales Executive Gas Producers Dag actually started last week BS Bioengineering Texas AM MBA Intl Finance Texas AM Relevant sales experience Enron yrs Altra Energy Technologies yrs Entergy Integrated Solutions yrs yrs telecom prior to energy industry Nicole Jensen Junior Accountant Referred by Bo Nash Eastfield Community College Accounting Relevant accounting experience Akili Systems Group yr Global Paradigm Solutions yrs Cyndi Henderson Manager Human Resources AllegroDevelopment direct fax email mailto visit wwwallegrodevelopmentcom Refinery Worksdoc dai mne znat smog ty raspechata ili net po messengeru Original Message From Chris Wich To Bianca Ornelas David Granit Felipe Ospina Gohar Butt Kevin Butler Leslie Eck Natalie Bondareva Tim Waggett Cc Claus Fleckenstein Sent PM Subject Pre Requisites Business Information for Liquids Product Training Greetings Attached youll find some reading materials for an introduction to the Crude Coal NGL and Refined products industry Included is a general glossary of terms that well be using PowerPoint presentations for the Petroleum and Coal business as well as some documentations on refining basics of NGLs and Crude Oil production refining transportation and trading In addition if you look on our intranet site there is some additional information to familiarize you with the business Its located at under Industry Information After reviewing this data you all should have a good knowledge of basic terms and practices in the business Thanks for your attention as I look forward to working with each of you next week Christopher Wich Jr Christopher Wich Jr Product Analyst Crude Oil Coal Refined Products NGLs AllegroDevelopment Ross Ave Suite Dallas Texas Fax Crude Oil
